Question: Question
title: Title
label: Label
aiAnalyzesLearningStyle: AI analyzes your learning style and creates custom study materials tailored to your needs.
autoGeneratedFlashcards: Auto-generated flashcards from your lectures with spaced repetition algorithms for optimal retention.
complexTopicsTransformed: Complex topics transformed into interactive mindmaps for better understanding and memory.
intelligentQuizzes: Intelligent quizzes that adapt to your knowledge level and focus on areas needing improvement.
convertStudyMaterials: Convert your study materials into engaging audio podcasts for learning on the go.
raceWithFriends: Race with friends, earn points for completing tasks, and climb the leaderboard together.
transformStudyExperience: Everything you need to transform your study experience and achieve your goals faster
everythingYouNeedToKnow: Everything you need to know about AI Learning Platform
howDoesAIGenerate: How does the AI generate study materials?
howPointsSystemWork: How does the points and racing system work?
isDataSecure: Is my data secure and private?
canUseAnySubject: Can I use this for any subject?
aiAnalyzesContent: Our advanced AI analyzes your uploaded content, identifies key concepts, and generates personalized study materials including flashcards, quizzes, mindmaps, and audio podcasts. The AI adapts to your learning style and focuses on the most important information.
supportFileFormats: We support PDF, PowerPoint (PPT/PPTX), Word documents (DOC/DOCX), text files, and images. You can upload lecture slides, notes, textbooks, or any study material you have.
earnPointsByCompleting: You earn points by completing quizzes, reviewing flashcards, and achieving study milestones. You can create or join study groups with friends and compete on leaderboards. The more you study, the more points you earn!
enterpriseGradeEncryption: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption to protect your data. Your study materials and personal information are never shared with third parties. You have full control over your data and can delete it at any time.
aiWorksAnySubject: Yes! Our AI works with any subject from mathematics and science to languages and humanities. Whether you're in high school, college, or professional training, the platform adapts to your needs.
freeTierPremiumPlans: We offer a free tier with essential features and premium plans starting at $9.99/month. The premium plans include unlimited AI generations, advanced analytics, priority support, and exclusive features.
aiPodcastsConvert: Our AI podcasts convert your study materials into engaging audio content with natural-sounding voices. Perfect for learning while commuting, exercising, or during breaks. You can adjust the speed and focus on specific topics.
createStudyGroups: Yes! You can create study groups, share materials, compete on leaderboards, and even quiz each other. Collaboration features help you learn together and stay motivated.
uploadLectures: Upload your lectures, get personalized study materials, and race for points with friends. Transform learning into an engaging competition.
fromUploadToMastery: From upload to mastery in three simple steps
watchHowAIDataTransforms: Watch how AI transforms your study materials in seconds
copyright: AI Learning Platform. All rights reserved.
transformYourLearning: Transform your learning experience with AI-powered study materials and compete with friends.
aiLearningDescription: Sign up in seconds and set up your personalized learning profile with your subjects and goals.
aiUploadDescription: Drop your lecture slides, notes, or documents. Support for PDFs, PowerPoints, and more.
aiCreationDescription: Our AI instantly generates flashcards, quizzes, mindmaps, and podcasts tailored to your content.
clickOutside: Click outside or scroll to close

clickCanvasPlaceNode: Click anywhere on the canvas to place the node —
afterSubmitClickCanvas: After you submit, click anywhere on the canvas to place the node.
gettingStartedSubject: Get started by creating your first subject. Organize your study materials, flashcards, and mindmaps in one place.
subjectIsCategory: A subject is a broad category like Mathematics, Biology, or Computer Science
